original: Bergström, Pontus, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 12/1/98 i Lerum, Älvsb. 1., av kronolänsm. Rudolf B. o. Alma Boström. G. 25 m. Margot Ericson. Barn: Petter f. 26, Mats 31, Mario 33. — Avg: ex. fr. CTH (E) 19, ASEAs ing:e’l:kurs 19-20. Anst. v. ASEAs Gbgs-filial 20-22, v. huv:kont. i Västerås 22, v. Sociedad Espanola de Electric. ASEA i Madrid 23-26, v. So- cietà Itai. di Eilettric. ASEA i Mdlanio 27-37, cbefsassist, v. ASEAs^ Gb^sfi-’liail fr. 37. Led. av ^ Sv. teikn ifören., Tekn. samf. i Gbg m. fl.
translated: Bergström, Pontus, engineer, Gothenburg, born on January 12, 1898 in Lerum, Älvsborgs län, son of Kronolänsm. Rudolf B. and Alma Boström. Married on May 25 to Margot Ericson. Children: Petter born in 1926, Mats in 1931, and Mario in 1933. Graduated from Chalmers University of Technology in (Electrical Engineering) in 1919, completed ASEAs engineering course in 1919-1920. Employed at ASEAs Gothenburg branch from 1920-1922, then transferred to head office in Västerås in 1922, then worked for Sociedad Espanola de Electric. ASEA in Madrid from 1923-1926, and for Società Itai. di Eilettric. ASEA in Milan from 1927-1937, before returning as chief assistant at ASEAs Gbg branch from 1937. Member of Swedish Engineering Association, Technical Society in Gothenburg, among others.
